## #Identifies number of columns in dfWeek 1

Exercise 1.1

```{r}

#Identifies type of vector
typeof(mtcars)

#Identifies class
class(mtcars)

#Identifies number of rows (observations) in df
nrow(mtcars)

#Identifies number of columns in df
ncol(mtcars)

#Identifies number of columns in df
length(mtcars)

#Identifies number of rows and columns in df
dim(mtcars)

#Identifies row names in df
rownames(mtcars)

#Identifies column names in df
colnames(mtcars)
```
